title: Create a Job
description: Create a Job named ||simple-job|| in Namespace ||mars|| that runs image ||busybox:1.31.0|| and executes the command ||'sleep 30 && echo done'||. The Job should run once.

steps: kubectl create job simple-job --image=busybox:1.31.0 --dry-run=client -o yaml > job.yaml

validations.command: kubectl get job simple-job -n mars -o jsonpath='{.status.succeeded}'
